805229966602436600,Sun Dec 04 01:59:19 +0000 2016,@briangaither during the last session. It had nothing to do with Gov helping Baltimore as he claimed. It was held for policy reasons.

805202165706981400,Sun Dec 04 00:08:50 +0000 2016,@briangaither and you believe he supports a targeted tax credit that makes current MD manufacturers less competitive?

805131829334392800,Sat Dec 03 19:29:21 +0000 2016,@eric_hontz @briangaither @LarryHogan kids are up from naps, back to work, glad to discuss later.
